articles.description: Follow live updates as England visit the Netherlands for their Women's Nations League group game in Utrecht.
articles.title: Women's Nations League: Build-up to Netherlands v England

articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage of six EFL Cup third-round ties, including Manchester United v Crystal Palace.
articles.title: EFL Cup: Build-up to seven ties, including Man Utd v Crystal Palace

articles.description: Watch live BBC Scotland coverage and follow text updates as Scotland play Belgium at Hampden in Women's Nations League Group A1.
articles.title: Watch: Scotland welcome Belgium in Women's Nations League

articles.title: Watch: Wales v Denmark in the Women's Nations League

articles.description: Live video coverage and text updates of the Uefa Women's Nations League game between Northern Ireland and Albania, plus updates from Hungary against the Republic of Ireland.
articles.title: Watch: Northern Ireland v Albania; follow Hungary v Republic of Ireland

articles.title: Viaplay Cup quarter-final: Kilmarnock host Hearts

articles.description: Ben Duckett makes an unbeaten century but England are denied the chance to post a huge total as the third ODI against Ireland is abandoned because of rain.
articles.title: Duckett hits ton as England-Ireland ODI abandoned

articles.description: The World Cup pool stage is approaching its conclusion - here are the permutations from the remaining group games.
articles.title: Who needs what to make World Cup quarter-finals?

articles.description: Chelsea manager Mauricio Pochettino says he is fine with the club's owners coming to the team's dressing room after matches as long as they do not "come for some speech".
articles.title: Chelsea owners welcome in dressing room - Pochettino

articles.description: Ben Duckett makes an unbeaten century but England are denied victory against Ireland as the third one-day international is abandoned because of rain.
articles.title: Duckett hits century before rain stops England-Ireland ODI
